meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to one million parsecs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use megaparsecs to measure vast distances in space.
meanings.sent2: The galaxy is located several megaparsecs away from our own.
meanings.sent3: When the alien spaceship landed, it asked for directions in megaparsecs!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as distant as a megaparsec.
meanings.sent5: The concept of megaparsecs can be mind-boggling for young students.

meanings.definition: The distance light travels in one megaparsec.
meanings.sent1: The speed of light is approximately 3 x 10^5 kilometers per second in megaparsecs.
meanings.sent2: The star emitted light that traveled a megaparsec before fading away.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight's beam reached only a fraction of a megaparsec into the dark cave.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like light through a megaparsec.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the night sky is best appreciated in terms of megaparsecs.
